meanings.definition: The rank or title of a marquess.
meanings.sent1: In the royal court, the marquessate was a prestigious title.
meanings.sent2: She inherited the marquessate after her father passed away.
meanings.sent3: The marquessate threw a grand ball to celebrate their new title.
meanings.sent4: The marquessate stood out among the other nobles like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The marquessate's elegant attire symbolized their high rank.

meanings.definition: The territory or estate of a marquess.
meanings.sent1: The marquessate's lands stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent2: Visitors were in awe of the marquessate's beautiful gardens.
meanings.sent3: The marquessate's estate was so vast, it took hours to explore.
meanings.sent4: The marquessate's territory was a paradise of rolling hills and lush forests.
meanings.sent5: The marquessate's grand mansion was the centerpiece of their estate.
